code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{GridContext}from'./GridContext';import Cell from'./Cell';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Grid=()=>{const{grid}=useContext(GridContext);const onCount=grid.flat().filter(Boolean).length;const gridStyle={display:'grid',gridTemplateColumns:'repeat(2, 100px)',gridTemplateRows:'repeat(2, 100px)'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Count: ",onCount]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:gridStyle,children:grid.map((row,rowIndex)=>row.map((cell,colIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cell,{rowIndex:rowIndex,colIndex:colIndex},`${rowIndex}-${colIndex}`)))})]});};export default Grid;
